name: Misleading Reflection
description:
A puzzle shooter game. You shoot ghosts with bullets that reflect from mirrors. 

Made by Tad M. Rad - itch.io. 

It's a submission to the Rookie Jam - itch.io by BobTheFirst - itch.io.

        W - Shoot    A/D - Left/Right

!PROTOTYPE!

This is unfortunately just a one level prototype, more of a tutorial even.
